37217.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「この島は いい:
This island is nice. There are dreams. When I was young, I chased my dreams and did a lot of whipping. Hmph. Now

37218.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「なんだい。\n:

to keep as a talisman when I was in the service! I'll trade you for it.

69610.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「ウェ～イ！ 来:
Way to go! Thank you for coming. I'm Vecchio, master of the Lamp Alchemy Guild! Ha ha ha! Don't make that

is a cool craftsman who can add effects such as increased restorative magic and increased maximum MP to

right now, nor am I recruiting them as artisans. Eh~ Reason? You're going to ask? You're going to ask that? I'm
sorry, but..! I have no choice~! Can we keep this between us? Actually, we've been getting a lot of requests

with them. Well, it seems like a lot of things have been going on lately. I guess it can't be helped. So, I'm
really sorry that I can't give you a chance to experience the runner-up training! Oh, but you're free to visit

48153.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「申し訳ないのであり:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>I am sorry, but I don't have time to

48155.「わたくしは ゴーレック様の第１執事。\n 主人が この島のオーナーになられて以:
I am Mr. Golek's first butler. I have been serving him ever since he became the owner of this island. Although the
master and I are from different races, we have shared many hardships for the development of Luckland and we are
like comrades. I am so sorry to hear that the master, who is bound by such a strong bond with you, is so
distressed that he cannot even exchange his favorite medals with you. You seem to be a well-traveled
adventurer. I would like to ask you for a favor in recognition of your strength. Please find our second
steward, Renoch! He went to a certain continent in search of a Mini Medal, but he got carried away and was found
with the house wardrobe, and was imprisoned. After that, master went to the authorities and Renoch was
released, but he has been missing ever since. The master is very worried that he has damaged Renoch's life because
of the mission he ordered. Can you please find Renoch? If we can confirm that he is safe and sound, master will
regain his strength and we will be able to exchange medals.

48156.「おおっ 引き受けてくださるのですね！\n 感謝いたしますぞ。:
Oh, you are willing to take on this
project! Thank you very much.

48157.「レノッホは 大陸間鉄道パスを持っております。\n プクランド大陸にある オルフ:
Renoch has a Rail Pass. He got off at the Town of Orphea in Pukuland Continent, but his whereabouts are
unknown. But he hasn't been to any other continent. If you search not only in towns, but also in places
where people live, you will find him someday.

48158.「おおっ 引き受けてくださるのですね！\n ……しかしながら あなた様は 多くの:

48160.「ゴーレック様は 自分が命じた任務で\n レノッホの人生に キズをつけてしまった:

48161.<close_irai>「彼は プクランド大陸のどこかにいるはずです。\n 町だ:

48162.「レノッホが 来てくれたのであります！\n なんという幸せ！ 自分は 今\n 猛:
Renoch came to see us! What happiness! I'm just now being moved by it! I've been wondering about the whereabouts

48163.「ありがとうございます。\n レノッホが 申しておりました。\n あなた様に声を:

49295.「ごきげんよう お客さま。\n 私 オーナー所有の 宝物の管理を\n まかされて:
Cheery, you have a visitor. My name is Sasalana and I'm in charge of the owner's treasures. My skill is super-
organizing. With this skill, you'll be able to keep more equipment than you already have. I see you as a skilled
adventurer, and I would like to discuss something with you. If you are willing to consult with me, I would be
happy to give you special instructions on how to increase your equipment inventory. Will you listen to me?

49297.「では お話しさせていただきます。\n 私の超整理術は 母より 教わったものです:
Let me tell you a story. My super- organizing skills are something I learned from my mother. As a young
child, I loved to organize with her. But one day, she suddenly disappeared. Rumor has it that she got involved in
something evil and that's why she left. I am troubled. If my mother was really involved in something evil, can
I continue to use her dirty tricks? I beg you, sir. I want to know the truth about what really happened in the past
and why my mother left me! If you grant my request, in return I will teach you a technique that will allow
you to store 100 more pieces of equipment.

79347.「いまの光と声は……？ ああ なんてこと！\n <pc>さま このメモには\n:
What's with the light and the voices now? Oh my god! In this note, it says about the secrets.
<&13aaaaaaaad> The note says about the secrets of the super-organizing technique: "In order to use the
storage goods and master the secrets, the user of the super-organizing technique needs to train himself. It
is a purification ceremony to purify oneself and quiet one's mind. I have no choice but to believe in this note
. I am curious about one thing. Where did this note come from, and who put it there? I will take some

188345.「<pc>さま。スギム局長に\n お伝えいただけますか。グランドタイタス号に\n:
Could you please inform Director Sugimu that I have repaired the organizing technique on Grand
Titus.

188346.<close_irai>「新しく取り付けた プレートに従ってもらえれば\n どな:
<close_irai>He said, "Anyone can easily store a
load in the warehouse by following the
newly installed plate.

188347.「<pc>さま お帰りなさいませ。\n スギム局長に ごあいさつもせず\n 先に:
Welcome back. I apologize for leaving before you without saying hello to Director
Sugimu.

188348.「……まあ スギム局長から そんなお話が！？\n スギム局長がお話しされていた:
Well, Director Sugimu told me that story! The woman Director Sugimu was talking about must be my mother. I
recognized her immediately when I saw the warehouse. It was definitely my mother's organizational skills. She
was on the Grand Titus, wasn't she?

188349.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「そして <pc:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>And <pc>. Thank you for
helping us organize the Grand Titus
warehouse this time.

188350.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr><icon_ex:
Yes, that's right! Actually, we have a few extra Rust-Proof Plates. Please lend me the equipment bag of
.

188351.「整理の基本は『どこに』『なにを』しまうか。\n 忘れないよう 袋の内側に縫い付:
The basic of organization is "where" and "what" to put away. I sewed them on the inside of the bag so you won't
forget them, so please store them properly according to the plate. Now you can store another 100 items in
's equipment bag, in addition to the 400 you have so far.

188352.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「そして <pc:
And . Thank you for helping us organize the Grand Titus warehouse. Please take this as a thank
you.

188353.「じつは こちらに戻ったあと\n ゴーレック様に 無断で出かけたことを謝罪し\n:
After I returned here, I apologized to Mr. Golek for going out without permission and reported the incident
to him, but he didn't even scold me. Whenever someone is in trouble, lend them your organizational skills. But
if you find a Mini Medal, bring it back to me. Now . I hope you enjoy your dreamy and comfortable
trip with my improved equipment bag.

188354.<pc>は ササラナに\nスギム局長から聞いた話を 伝えた！:
<pc> told Sasalana what
Director Sugimu had told him!

188355.<pc>が そうびぶくろをササラナに渡すと\nササラナは 小さなプレートを\nそ:
When handed the equipment bag to Sasalana, Sasalana sewed a small plate onto the equipment
bag and handed it back to him.

188356.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「ごきげんよう:
Cheery like . How is your equipment bag? The trick on the Grand Titus, that was definitely my mother's
organizing trick. She was on that boat. Come on . I hope you enjoy your dreamy and comfortable
trip with my improved equipment bag.

35813.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「こちらは 関係:
<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>This area is off-limits to all parties
concerned. If you understand that,
please leave immediately!

35814.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「ううっ。ポムレ:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>Pomre-chan is so cute! She's too cute!
If I could, I'd take her as a bride!

35815.<turn_pc>「ポムレちゃんに プロポーズしたいけど\n 種族のちがいという:
I want to propose to Pomre-chan, but there's this insurmountable obstacle of the difference in races standing in
our way. Ah! Why didn't God give me birth in Pukulipo? It's too cruel!

48719.<turn_pc>「……でも オレと 彼女の間には\n 種族のちがいという 乗り:
But there is an insurmountable obstacle between me and her, the difference in races. Ah! Why didn't
God give me birth in Pukulipo? It's too cruel!

40668.「いよいよ コロシアムも本格オープンだ！\n オレは 今 燃えに燃えてるぜぇ！！:
Coliseum is finally open for business! I'm on fire right now! I've only just started, so I'm still at C4 rank, but
at this rate, I'm sure I'll be able to get as low as B2 rank!

40672.「さあさ よってらっしゃいませ。\n こちらが ラッカラン名物\n 大コロシアム:
Come on, come on, come on. This is Luckland's specialty, the Great Coliseum! Look, there's a customer
over there! Since you have come all the way to Luckland Island, please come and experience the Coliseum!

80227.「島の南西にある 大きな建物が\n 娯楽島ラッカランの名物のコロシアムだ。\n<:
The large building on the southwest side of the island is the famous Coliseum of Luckland Island. And in
the middle of the island is the headquarters of the Lamp Alchemy Guild. On the other side of the
Coliseum, there is another famous building in Luckland, the Casino. You can easily recognize it because it is
a big and fancy building.

40675.「道具屋や 宿屋 教会なんかは\n コロシアムの中にも ありますよ。\n<br>:
Item shops and inn churches are also located in Coliseum. It is very convenient for the participants of
Coliseum. Well, they are very considerate.

35821.「この娯楽島ラッカランも ほんの数十年前は\n ほとんど 人の住まない\n ただ:
Just a few decades ago, Luckland Island was an isolated island in the middle of the ocean, almost completely
uninhabited. It is now flourishing because of the power of one man who built a town, a train station, and a
coliseum. I'm talking about the medal owner, of course. I am truly humbled by his never-ending passion.

53608.「世界中で 便せん屋をやっているのが\n エルフの女の子だけって 気付いてました:
Did you know that Elf girls are the only ones who run a Paper Shop in the world? Actually, the letter paper sold
in the Paper Shop is made of a special paper made by a secret process that has been handed down only to Elf
girls. And it is one of our jobs at the Paper Shop to make them. We don't just keep watch at the store.

35823.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「し 仕事とはいえ:
I can't believe that I have to dress like this, even if it's for work. Ah! Father. Mother. Please forgive me for
being such a lowly girl!

40677.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「ランプ錬金の技を極:
I came all the way from Royal City Kamiharmui to this island of amusement to master the art of lamp smelting. I
became addicted to watching the Coliseum games, and after visiting day after day, I finally became a
participant. I have no regrets, but I can't let my parents back home see me now.

40678.「コ…コロシアムのバトルに 参加したいけど\n いざ こうして オープンされると:
I want to participate in the battle of CoColiseum, but when it opens like this, I can't move my feet. Ugh, I
think I'll just observe for now and join in tomorrow.

35827.「思いきって 豪華な部屋をとっちゃったけど\n こんな フカフカのベッドじゃあ\:
I took the plunge and got a luxurious room, but I can't sleep peacefully on such a fluffy bed~. Haaah. I've never
been so envious of the poverty that's been baked into me as I am now.

35828.「この島なら 仕事があると思って\n はるばる やってきたんだけど……。\n<b:
I came all the way here because I thought there would be work here on the island. Everyone who works here is
at a very high level. I wonder if I can make it.

35829.「この島に 仕事を探しにきたんだけど\n 今は どこも 人手が足りてるらしくて\:
I came to this island to look for a job, but it seems like all the places are short-staffed right now, so they
wouldn't hire me. Ahh..! I can't believe I came all the way here and was turned away at the door! Somebody
give me a job!

35842.「オレは コロシアムが建設される前から\n この島で暮らしはじめ その作られてい:
I started living on the island before the Coliseum was built and have spent my entire life watching it being
built. Now that the Coliseum is open, I'm happy to be able to watch the games every day. It's been worth the
wait!

35849.「娯楽島ラッカランは 楽しいトコだけど\n お笑いのレベルは イマイチだよね～。:
Luckland Island is a fun place, but the level of comedy is not so good. But that's what I'm aiming for. I'm
going to take the island by storm with my hilarious comedy act, and then I'm going to go out to the world as a top-
class entertainer in the Hall of Fun and Games!

35850.「ポムレちゃんが 並のバニーとちがうのは\n ズバリ あの耳さ！\n<br>\n:
What sets Pomre apart from other bunnies is her ears! They are natural! They are real bunny ears! They are
different from other fake ears.

35851.「はぁ～い！\n わたしぃ 人気ナンバーワン・バニーの\n ポムレちゃんでぇ～す:
Hi~! I'm Pomre, the most popular bunny in the world If you're talking to me, then I guess you're a Pomre fan
too?

35852.「やっぱりぃ そうだと思ったぁ<heart>\n<br>\n「でも ゴメンねぇ。:
I knew it! I thought so But I'm sorry. I don't do Fan service like signing autographs or shaking
hands.

35853.<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>「え～っ！ 信じ:
<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>Ehh~! I can't believe it! It's okay! I
don't talk to people who don't like
you, Pomre.

35854.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「だからぁ サイ:
<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>That's why I can't give you autographs
or handshakes or anything like that.

35856.「この階段の上は 娯楽島ラッカランの\n オーナーの執務室に なっております。\:
The owner of Luckland Island has his office above this staircase. The owner is a friendly person, so you should
come and say hello to him.

35857.「この階段の上は 娯楽島ラッカランの主\n メダル・オーナー ゴーレック様の\n:
Above this staes is the office of Mr. Golek, the main medal owner of Luckland Island. The owner is a
friendly person, so you should come and say hello to him.

40685.「私は コロシアムのバトルを観戦するため\n この島に やってきたんです。\n<:
I came to this island to watch the battle of Coliseum. I have never seen such an exciting spectacle! You won't
find a more exciting spectacle anywhere!

35861.「おっと……！\n 急に 話しかけて おどろかそうとしても\n そうは いきませ:
Oops! I'm not going to scare you by suddenly talking to you. My street art has become a thing of the past. Now, I
feel like I can do it with my eyes closed!

40686.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「こんな町でも:
<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>I guess there are churches even in a
town like this. Do people come to pray
for victory at Coliseum?

35865.「なんでも この島のオーナーは\n めずらしい宝物を たくさん持っていて\n そ:
The owner of this island has a lot of rare treasures that he is willing to exchange for certain things. The owner
of Utopia Luckland Island is indeed a tubby guy. What? What do you mean by "something"? Oh, no, no, no, no. You
know what it is, don't you? It's a small, round, shiny thing! That thing!

35866.「なんでも オーナーが ラッカラン島に\n このような町を作ったのも\n ちいさ:
The owner built this town on Luckland Island to attract Mini Medalists. I see. In this town, travelers from all
over the world will gather. So the medals will be plentiful.

35867.「この町のコンパニオンの女の子たちは\n みんな レベルが高くて いいね！\n<:
The companion girls in this town are all of a high caliber! And they are kind enough to have beautiful girls
from all over the world! The owner knows what he's doing.

35868.「こちらは 娯楽島ラッカランがほこる\n ５つ星ホテル ロイヤル・ラッカランで\:
This is the Royal Luckland, a 5-star hotel in Luckland Island. Our gorgeous rooms and reasonable prices are very
popular among our guests.

80228.「やっと カジノがオープンしたのよ。\n たんまり お金を コインに換えたことだ:
The Casino is finally open. Now that I've converted a lot of money into coins, I'm going to sit back and enjoy
it. I'm going to see if they can satisfy me, a man who has gambled his way through everything. Ho-ho-ho.

83707.「やっと カジノがオープンしたんだ！\n これを目当てに 名だたるギャンブラーた:
The Casino has finally opened! It seems that famous gamblers from all over the world are flocking to this
casino. Oh, how I wish I could try my hand at a little gambling. I envy being a security guard.

35874.「ここだけの話 ゴーレック様には\n ドワチャッカ大陸の岳都ガタラに 血を分けた:
Between you and me, I heard that Mr. Golek has a younger brother who is related to Mount Gatara of Dwachakka
Continent. I heard that he has a hot collector's soul, even more than Mr. Golek. Blood can never cover up the
truth.

35875.「ここだけの話 ゴーレック様と\n 岳都ガタラの弟さんは かなり\n 仲が 悪い:
Between you and me, I hear that Mr. Golek and Mount Gatara's brother don't get along very well. He's always
saying, "He's just collecting useless junks! He's always angry with me. But I think it's the same with Mr. Golek
that he collects useless things. I wonder if we are similar brothers after all.

80229.「よぉ お客さん！\n とうとう カジノが オープンしたんだ！\n<br>\n「:
Hey there, guys! The Casino is finally open! Since you're in Luckland, why don't you drop by? It's a big
entertainment center, just like the Coliseum!

80231.「……やれやれ。家内ときたら 油断してると \n 持ち金を 全て カジノのコイン:
Oh dear. I can't take my eyes off my wife, because if she's not careful, she'll try to convert all our money
into coins for the Casino. I can't wait to see how good the Casino, which is said to be the centerpiece of
Luckland Island, will be.

35878.「あちらに いらっしゃるのが\n この娯楽島ラッカランのオーナー\n ゴーレック:
The owner of Luckland Island, Mr. Golek, is over there. He is also called the "Medal Owner" because he
exchanges Mini Medals for valuable treasures. If you have a Mini Medal, you can have it exchanged.

35882.「この町みたいに いろいろな種族の人が\n なんの区別もなく 一緒に暮らしてる場:
It is rare to find a place like this town where people of different races live together without any distinction.
I wish other countries were like this. I think the catchphrase "the Utopia of the world" isn't wrong.
